verbose_text: Because only the patients in the pregabalin group had reports of the cumulative consumption of morphine, pooled results suggested that pregabalin can reduce the cumulative consumption of morphine at 48 hours (WMD = -6.52, 95% CI -7.78, -5.25, P =.000, Fig. XREF_FIG).
evidence: pregabalin can reduce the cumulative consumption of morphine
